content: “But Trump apparently cannot accept the facts: There is no evidence that voter fraud occurred,” FACTS ARE!!! there are plenty of cities, state legislators & candidates that want/ advocate illegals vote in elections. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u24hhUdn3jw Some Cities Want Their Noncitizen Immigrants to Vote"Look at illegal immigrants voting all over the country," Donald Trump recently claimed in a Fox News interview, part…www.bloomberg.comIT’S ALSO IT’S ALSO FACT!!
